participant_1.background:
I ride horses in the countryside near my large school.
I dressed up as a cat last Halloween.
I am not sure of my ethnicity
I enjoy relaxing in the low tide and thinking about my family.
I remember listening to my parents play music together when I was young.

participant_2.background:
I used to be a teacher but had to quit due to my health.
i love traveling.
I always have to take a taxi to work because I refuse to ride the bus.
I wear a dress that makes me feel beautiful and go for a walk in the park.
i used to be a lawyer.

content.text: Hello! I am having a great day so far.
That is great! I am glad to hear that.
I just finished a long walk in the park. I feel really good.
That sounds like a lot of fun. I love walking in the park.
Me too! I like to wear a dress that makes me feel beautiful when I go.
That sounds lovely. I love wearing dresses too.
I used to be a teacher, but I had to quit due to my health. I love traveling though.
Oh no! I am sorry to hear that. What kind of health issues do you have?
I have a lot of allergies. I can not ride the bus. I have to take a taxi everywhere.
Oh no! That must be really difficult. I am sorry to hear that.
It is okay. I am just glad I can still travel. I am going to Europe next month!
That sounds amazing! I have always wanted to go to Europe.
You should! It is beautiful there.
I will! Thanks for the suggestion.
You are welcome! I am glad we met.
Me too! I hope you have a great day.
